item.title: ShellCast Web App
item.description: Collaborators NG Nelson (NC State), S Hall (NC State), A Haines (NC Division of Marine Fisheries), S Jenkins (NC Division of Marine Fisheries), D Glenn (NOAA NWS), K Riley (NOAA NWS), E Herbst (NC Sea Grant), C Matteo (NC Shellfish Growers Association), E Allen (NC State OIT), C Tenan (NC State OIT), W Turner (NC State OIT), M Vandegrift (NC State Libraries) Timeline 2020-2022 Project Goal The goal of this project is to develop a web application (web app) forecast tool, called ShellCast.
